attributes.action: guarantee that the salaries of members of parliament not exceed the limitations placed on other pulic sector workers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is sheer hypocrisy that M.P.s should be allowed to award themselves more than other public sector workers.There is no justification at all, there are no special reasons and it is invidious of them to restrict others working as hard because they have the power to vote for themselves. M.P.s should learn to live within their means and leave politics if they can find better paid employment in the private sector.This does nothing to enhance their integrity  and is quite despicable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
